channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk View SE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- FactoryTalk View SE

item.title: CVE-2020-12031|2024-09-16T16:48:08.622Z -- rockwell%20automation -- factorytalk%20view%20se
item.description: In all versions of FactoryTalk View SE, after bypassing memory corruption mechanisms found in the operating system, a local, authenticated attacker may corrupt the associated memory space allowing for arbitrary code execution. Rockwell Automation recommends applying patch 1126290. Before installing this patch, the patch rollup dated 06 Apr 2020 or later MUST be applied. 1066644 â€“ Patch Roll-up for CPR9 SRx.
